ai.summary: A 11.4 km moderate hike along the Military Route in Stowe, UK. The route traverses countryside, woodland, and historic paths, typically taking about 3-4 hours depending on pace.
ai.terrain_summary: Mixed terrain including grassy bridleways, woodland trails, and occasional paved sections. Moderate elevation gain with uneven footing in places; can be muddy in wet weather and may include steps or gentle ascents.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Stay on marked paths, especially in farmland and woodland. Check the forecast and avoid hiking in severe weather. Bring water, snacks, and a basic first aid kit. Have a map or GPS and a charged phone. Inform someone of your planned route and estimated return time. Be mindful of pedestrians, cyclists, and livestock on rural sections.
recommended_gear: Weather-appropriate clothing, including a waterproof layer
Map and compass or GPS device
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn; the route is best in mild conditions, but can be hiked year-round with suitable gear.

seo.title: Military Route, Stowe – 11.4 km Moderate Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the 11.4 km Military Route in Stowe, UK. A moderate, scenic hike through countryside and woodlands with safety tips and gear recommendations.
